definition[0]: to think about a problem or situation until you find the answer or understand what has happened
example[0]: If I have a map, I can figure it out.
example[1]: Don’t worry, we’ll figure something out  (=find a way to solve the problem).
example[2]: Can you figure out how to do it?
definition[1]: to understand why someone behaves in the way they do
example[3]: Women. I just can’t figure them out.
